title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-2.12 - Fair hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-2.12 - Fair hearing

State Regulations

Fair hearing means a formal procedure provided by OAH
upon a request made for an applicant or recipient to determine whether an
action taken or failure to act by a social services agency was
correct. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
358-2.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
